title: Dr. Deb Sandella Brief Intervention Research Fund
description: To provide support to test the clinical utility and comparative effectiveness of brief psychotherapeutic interventions at the CU Anschutz Medical Campus.   If $25K is raised within five years, the fund will be administered as a pure endowment.
marketingContent: To provide support to test the clinical utility and comparative effectiveness of brief psychotherapeutic interventions at the CU Anschutz Medical Campus. If $25K is raised within five years, the fund will be administered as a pure endowment.
